saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.service

Class BleTrackerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Application
          • saarland.cispa.bletrackerlib.service.BleTrackerService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, org.altbeacon.beacon.MonitorNotifier, org.altbeacon.beacon.startup.BootstrapNotifier

    public final class BleTrackerService
extends android.app.Application
implements org.altbeacon.beacon.startup.BootstrapNotifier
    This is the heart of the Lib here the AltBeacon scanner service is created and invoked. This class has to be the application context yor app and must be specified in the android manifest!! There the callback is fired if a beacon is near. For getting the beacon information a RangeNotifierImpl gets created for both, the background scanner and the foreground scanner in the specific methods createBackgroundService(ArrayList, RemoteConnection) and createForegroundService(ArrayList, Notification, RemoteConnection).
